attributes.action: Stop all illegal immigration via the English Channel from Europe.
attributes.background: To date this year there has been approximately 1400 illegal migrants picked up by border force or handed over by The French border patrols to the British border patrols. Some are not seen and land on beaches on the South coast and just walk into the country unchecked, This has to stop now.

rejection.details:
Under international law, it is legal for a person to apply for asylum in any country that has signed the 1951 Geneva Convention and to remain there until the authorities have assessed their claim. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to withdraw from international treaties that give people the right to seek asylum in the UK, if that's what you'd like to happen.
